scripts.emulate: npm --prefix functions run build && firebase emulators:start
scripts.deploy_staging: nuxt build &&  cp dist/index.html functions/templates/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting --project=staging && firebase deploy --only functions --project=staging
scripts.deploy: nuxt build && cp dist/index.html functions/templates/index.html &&  firebase deploy --only hosting --project=staging && firebase deploy --only functions --project=staging
scripts.deploy:dev: nuxt build && cp dist/index.html functions/templates/index.html &&  firebase deploy --only hosting --project=default && firebase deploy --only functions --project=default
scripts.use_staging: firebase use staging && cp src/config/default/ownplate-dev.js src/config/project.js
scripts.use_production: firebase use production && cp src/config/default/ownplate.js src/config/project.js
scripts.use_eu: firebase use eu && cp src/config/default/ownplate-eu.js src/config/project.js
scripts.use_jp: firebase use jp && cp src/config/default/ownplate-jp.js src/config/project.js
